questions.question_text: Satsangā’dhikṛutah ______ sarve sukhā’dhi-kāriṇaha । Sarve’rhā brahmavidyāyām nāryash-chaiva narās-tathā ॥
questions.explanation: The verse states 'Satsangā’dhikṛutah sarve sarve sukhā’dhi-kāriṇaha'.

questions.question_text: Satsangmā ling-bhedthī nyūnādhikpaṇu na ja samajavu. Badhā pot-potānī maryādāmā rahī bhakti vaḍe muktine pāmī shake chhe.
questions.explanation: This is the translation of Satsang Diksha Shlok 13.

questions.question_text: Naiva nyūnādhikatvam syāt satsange ______ । Sva-sva-maryādayā sarve bhaktyā muktim samāpnuyuhu ॥
questions.explanation: The verse states 'Naiva nyūnādhikatvam syāt satsange linga-bhedataha'.

questions.question_text: Sarva varṇanā sarva strīo tathā sarva puruṣho sadāy satsang, brahma-vidyā ane mokṣhanā adhikārī chhe.
questions.explanation: This is the translation of Satsang Diksha Shlok 14.

questions.question_text: Sarva-varṇa-gatāh sarvā nāryah sarve narās-tathā । Satsange brahmavidyāyām mokṣhe ______ ॥
questions.explanation: The verse states 'Satsange brahmavidyāyām mokṣhe sadā’dhikāriṇaha'.

questions.question_text: Varṇanā ādhāre kyārey nyūnādhik-bhāv na karavo. Sarva janoe potānā varṇanu mān tyajīne paraspar sevā karavī.
questions.explanation: This is the translation of Satsang Diksha Shlok 15.

questions.question_text: Tyaktvā sva-varṇa-mānam cha sevā kāryā ______ samaihi ॥
questions.explanation: The verse states 'Tyaktvā sva-varṇa-mānam cha sevā kāryā mithah samaihi'.

questions.question_text: Jātie karīne koī mahān nathī ane koī nyūn paṇ nathī. Tethī nāt-jātne laīne klesh na karavo ne sukhe satsang karavo.
questions.explanation: This is the translation of Satsang Diksha Shlok 16.

questions.question_text: Jātyā naiva mahān ko’pi naiva ______ tathā yataha । Jātyā klesho na kartavyah sukham satsangam ācharet ॥
questions.explanation: The verse states 'Jātyā naiva mahān ko’pi naiva nyūnas-tathā yataha'.

questions.question_text: Puruṣho tathā strīo sarve satsangnā ______ chhe, sarve sukhnā adhikārī chhe ane sarve brahma-vidyānā adhikārī chhe.
questions.explanation: The translation states 'Puruṣho tathā strīo sarve satsangnā adhikārī chhe'.
